1370: Lotijn was born in Mooierstraet in 1370.
Got married to Alretieren at age 19 in 1370.
Had a daughter with Alretieren, Hille, at age 19.
1376: Had a daughter with Alretieren, Clementia, at age 25.
1380: Had a son with Alretieren, Gheuardus, at age 29.
1382: Had a son with Alretieren, Syuardus, at age 31.
1384: Lost son Syuardus when Syuardus was 3 years old.
1386: Had a daughter with Alretieren, Ymmekine, at age 35.
1387: Had a son with Alretieren, Alem, at age 36.
1388: Lost son Gheuardus when Gheuardus was 9 years old.
1390: Lost his wife Alretieren while she was giving birth to Adam in 1390.
